error.phone-number-at-least: Phone number at least must be 8 digit
error.invalid-country-code: Country you selected is not supported

sign-up.create-account-desc: Create your Web Husut App account and start your journey to better health, today.
sign-up.enter-phone-number: Enter your mobile phone number to begin.
sign-up.enter-email-address: Enter your email address to begin.
sign-up.need-help-desc: If you need help setting up your account, please call us at <0>72702000</0> or email us at <1>support@husut.app.com</1>.
sign-up.access-to-us-medical: Access to board-certified and licensed US medical doctors
sign-up.bi-lingual-support: Translation of medical documents and bi-lingual support for your medical concerns
sign-up.enter-confirmation-code: Please enter the PIN code we sent to
sign-up.create-password-for: Please create a password for the account:
sign-up.thanks-message: Thanks for confirming! Now let's create a password for your account.
sign-up.password-warning: Passwords must be in english input, and must be at least 8 characters long with 1 number and 1 special character.
sign-up.code-sent-phone: We sent you a confirmation code to your phone.
sign-up.code-sent-email: We sent you a confirmation code to your email.
sign-up.go-back-warning: Are you sure to go back to previous page? You might need to get new confirmation code!
sign-up.you-need-to-wait-60sec: You need to wait ${sec} second(s) to get confirmation code again.

sign-in.enter-phone: Please enter your mobile phone number.
sign-in.need-help: If you need help, please call us at <0/> or email us at <1/>.
sign-in.login-error-phone: Incorrect phone number and password combination.
sign-in.login-error-email: Incorrect email address and password combination.
sign-in.enter-confirmation-code: Please enter the confirmation code we sent to ${phonenumber}
